feature.name: Infinite mana lands you control can produce

combos.description:
Cast Peregrine Drake by paying {4}{U}.
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, it triggers itself twice due to Panharmonicon.
Resolve one Peregrine Drake trigger, untapping five lands.
Activate those lands by tapping them to add at least {3}{U}{U}.
Resolve the remaining Peregrine Drake trigger, untapping five lands.
Activate those lands by tapping them to add at least {4}{U}.
Cast Venser by paying {2}{U}{U}.
When Venser enters the battlefield, it triggers itself twice due to Panharmonicon, returning itself and Peregrine Drake from the battlefield to your hand.
Repeat.
combos.notablePrerequisites: You control lands that can produce at least {3}{U}{U}.

combos.notes: If you control five lands that can tap to produce at least {3}{U}, this combo nets infinite mana, and you may blink any other permanent besides Peregrine Drake.

feature.name: Infinite mana lands you control can produce
Infinite untap of lands you control

combos.description:
Activate up to five lands by tapping them, adding at least {2}{U}.
Cast Ghostly Flicker by paying {2}{U}, blinking Eternal Witness and Peregrine Drake.
When Eternal Witness and Peregrine Drake enter the battlefield, their abilities trigger.
Resolve the Eternal Witness trigger, returning Ghostly Flicker to your hand from your graveyard.
Resolve the Peregrine Drake trigger, untapping up to five lands.
Repeat.
combos.notablePrerequisites: You control up to five lands that can tap to produce at least {2}{U}.

combos.notes: If the lands can produce at least {3}{C}, this combo nets infinite mana, and you may blink any number of other creature(s).

feature.name: Infinite mana lands you control can produce

combos.description:
Activate up to five lands by tapping them, adding at least {2}{C}.
Activate Eldrazi Displacer by paying {2}{C}, blinking Peregrine Drake.
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, it triggers, untapping up to five lands.
Repeat.
combos.notablePrerequisites: You control up to five lands that can tap to produce at least {2}{C}.

feature.name: Infinite mana nonland permanents you control can produce

combos.description:
Activate Eldrazi Displacer by paying {2}{C}, blinking Abdel Adrian.
Abdel Adrian leaves and enters the battlefield, causing all cards exiled with it to return to the battlefield from exile, and triggering Abdel Adrian's enters-the-battlefield ability.
Holding priority, activate the nonland mana-producing permanent(s) by tapping them, adding at least {3}{C}.
Resolve the Abdel Adrian trigger, exiling the nonland mana-producing permanent(s) and creating that many 1/1 Soldier creature tokens.
Repeat.
combos.notablePrerequisites: Nonland permanent card(s) you own that can produce at least {3}{C} exiled by Abdel Adrian.

combos.notes: If you control five lands that can tap to produce at least {3}{U}, this combo nets infinite mana, and you may blink any other permanent besides Peregrine Drake.

feature.name: Infinite mana lands you control can produce
Infinite untap of lands you control

combos.description:
Activate up to five lands by tapping them, adding at least {2}{U}.
Cast Ghostly Flicker by paying {2}{U}, blinking Timeless Witness and Peregrine Drake.
When Timeless Witness and Peregrine Drake enter the battlefield, their abilities trigger.
Resolve the Timeless Witness trigger, returning Ghostly Flicker to your hand from your graveyard.
Resolve the Peregrine Drake trigger, untapping up to five lands.
Repeat.
combos.notablePrerequisites: You control up to five lands that can tap to produce at least {2}{U}.

feature.name: Infinite blinking of nonland permanents you control

combos.description:
Cast Cloudshift by paying its mana cost, blinking Abdel Adrian.
Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield, returning Eternal Witness and all other cards that were exiled with it to the battlefield.
Abdel Adrian and Eternal Witness trigger.
Resolve the Eternal Witness trigger, returning Cloudshift from your graveyard to your hand.
Holding priority, activate any number of nonland permanents you control by tapping them, adding at least enough mana to cast Cloudshift.
Resolve the Abdel Adrian trigger, exiling Eternal Witness and the mana-producing permanents until Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield, and creating a 1/1 Soldier creature token for each permanent exiled this way.
Repeat.
combos.notablePrerequisites:
You have any number of other nonland permanents that enter the battlefield untapped, and that can collectively tap to produce enough mana to cast Cloudshift exiled by Abdel Adrian.
Eternal Witness exiled by Abdel Adrian.
You have enough mana to cast Cloudshift.
